ygData.subject: Re: Location of Runes
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok..what did I do wrong? I am 17th Level Enchanter. Been finding and trading for the Pages of Grimiore.  I have my Old Eradin up to Average. and i have the
ygData.messageBody:
Ok..what did I do wrong?

I am 17th Level Enchanter. Been finding and trading for the Pages of
Grimiore. I have my Old Eradin up to Average. and i have the book of
Ancient Restoration. I took 2 parts of page 26, a right side torn page, and
a left side torn page, both where page 26... I put them into the Restoration
Book, hit combine and get a message something like 'These items do not
combine to make anything' (or somesuch message) .. this leads me to believe
i have done something wrong or i would have gotten a 'your skill is not good
enough' type of message.

A friend of mine has had the same problem, and states that he has tried
different combinations of pages like both the same side of same page number,
etc ..

Can anyone help me out by telling me the propper procedure? Thus far I have
found nothing in the game at all that would reveal how to use the Book of
Ancient Restoration, or how to combine the pages into full sheets. I am
under the impression that once the pages are combined and if the attempt
succeeds your skill I'll end up with a spell scroll. Perhaps I'm wrong in
my assumption? Any help would be appreciated.
